title: One Piece Episode 620 Anime Review
author: Unknown
description: Written review of Episode 620 discussing the killing blow for Punk Hazard and exploring Law's heart-swapping tricks that caused Joker's plan to go awry and saved Smoker.

title: One Piece Reaction - Punk Hazard - Episode 620-622
author: Unknown
description: Reaction video covering Episodes 620-622 of the Punk Hazard arc, showing first-time viewer responses to the heart-switching revelation and Doflamingo's arrival.

title: 620-622: 'A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!', 'Capture Caesar! General Cannon Blasts!' and 'A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kinemon!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Detailed blog post covering episodes 620-622 with analysis of the heart-switching twist. Describes it as 'The biggest twist was Caesar accidentally stabbing Monet in the heart. That was brutal and a genuine shock.'

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - End of the Punk Hazard Arc (Episodes 625, 628-629)

description: Podcast episode covering the end of the Punk Hazard Arc. While it focuses on later episodes, it provides context for the arc's climax starting with episode 620.
